short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right Click -> Upload Image to Arxius

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily upload images to Arxius by right clicking and choosing "Upload Image to Arxius".

Add your Arxius API Key from the icon on the chrome taskbar to attach images to your Arxius account.

** Steps to retrieving your API Key **
1. Make sure you're logged in to https://arxius.io
2.  Right click and select "Inspect" anywhere on the page.
3. In the bottom right corner of your browser in the "Console" section you should now see a text version of the Arxius logo with your apikey beneath it.
4. Copy and paste that key into the chrome extension and the images will be attached to your account.
